item.title: On Domain-Specific Post-Training for Multimodal Large Language Models
item.description: AdaMLLM enhances multimodal LLMs for specific domains via a novel visual instruction synthesizer and a single-stage post-training pipeline, achieving superior performance compared to existing methods.
